Label: Directs
Details: As Co-Director of the Global Vaccine Data Network, Helen Petousis-Harris leads the organization's research and policy initiatives.

Label: Funds
Details: The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation provides funding support to the Global Vaccine Data Network for vaccine safety monitoring.

Label: Analyses
Details: The Global Vaccine Data Network conducts safety monitoring and analysis of the Pfizer-BioNTech vaccine's performance across multiple countries.

Label: Promotes
Details: Helen Petousis-Harris advocates for vaccine uptake through media appearances and public health communications.

Label: Owns
Details: The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation holds ownership stakes in BioNTech through investments.

Label: Invented
Details: BioNTech developed the mRNA technology platform used in the Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine.

Label: Shares Revenue
Details: The Pfizer-BioNTech vaccine generates revenue that is shared between the partner companies.

Label: Funded
Details: The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation funded the Imaging TB Consortium's research initiatives.

Label: Funded
Details: The Imaging TB Consortium supported Siouxsie Wiles's early bioluminescence research.

Label: Promotes
Details: Siouxsie Wiles actively promotes vaccine uptake through media appearances and public communications.

Label: Owns
Details: Melinda Gates Co-Founded and Co-Chaired the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation.

Label: Owns
Details: Melinda Gates owns Pivotal Ventures, her investment and incubation company.

Label: Funded
Details: Pivotal Ventures has provided significant funding to Jacinda Ardern's leadership.

Label: Promotes
Details: As Prime Minister, Jacinda Ardern promoted vaccine uptake and led New Zealand's vaccination strategy.

Label: Financial Gain
Details: BMGF bought their stake in BioNTech shortly before they went public and sold them at the peak during vaccine rollout.
